welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sagamihara, a city known for its beautiful natural scenery, vibrant cultural scene, and rich history. We invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: カレーの店 マボロシ
restaurants.description: カレーの店 マボロシ is a japanese curry restaurant located in 相模原市.
restaurants.address: 中央区中央3-7-1, 相模原市, 神奈川県, 252-0239
